section.para: To view Costing information related to Work Orders, select the "Work Order Costing" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying Costing information for Work Orders, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Work Order Number of the Work Order whose costing information you want to view.
Displays Site code automatically when Work Order Number is entered into "Work Order #" field.
Displays Item Number automatically when Work Order Number is entered into "Work Order #" field.
Displays Work Order Status automatically when Work Order Number is entered into "Work Order #" field.
Select to include set up Costs in the display.
Select to include run time Costs in the display.
Select to include material Costs in the display.
Display lists costing by Work Order, using the specified parameters.
